long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prepare yourself for one of the toughest challenges in gaming history! The World's Hardest Game is now just a click away with this Chrome extension. Navigate through impossible mazes, dodge relentless obstacles, and collect every coinâ€”all without leaving your browser! This extension brings frustration and fun straight to your fingertips, perfect for quick breaks or marathon gaming sessions.

Why Install the Extension?

ğŸ® Instant Access: Open the game directly from your browser toolbar with a single click.
ğŸ•¹ï¸ No Setup Required: No downloads, no installationsâ€”play the full game right inside your browser.
ğŸ”¥ Test Your Skills Anywhere: Whether at work, home, or on the go, challenge yourself wherever you are.
ğŸ“ˆ Track Your Progress: Keep playing and improvingâ€”can you finish with fewer deaths?
ğŸŒ Offline Play: The game works even without an internet connectionâ€”perfect for long trips or breaks.
ğŸ… Bragging Rights: Compete with friends and share your high scores with just a few clicks.
Features:

ğŸ”´ Navigate the red square through tricky mazes and avoid blue obstacles.
ğŸŸ¡ Collect all coins to unlock the path to victory.
â±ï¸ Push yourself to complete levels as fast as possible.
ğŸ† Compete against yourself and friends to achieve the fewest deaths.
How to Use:

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click the game icon in your browser toolbar to launch it.
Challenge yourself to complete levels without losing lives.
Play anywhere, anytimeâ€”no internet needed!
